CHARGING POWTSRS Off,CERTAIN;TRANSPORT UNDSRTAKINCS.Copy of letter from Secretary, Ministry of Transport to _ the Secretary to the Cabinet.' _(Circulated for Information).MINISTRY OP.TRANSPORT, 1.3207. Secretarial and Legal Department,6, Whitehall Gardens,London, S.W.1. 1st. October, 1921.Sir,I am directed by the Minister of Transport to refer to his Memorandum C.P.3238, dated August 17th and to say that as the matter dealt with therein has now been settled in communicatio4 with the Prime Minister and the other Ministers concerned, it is now unnecessary that it should be brought before the Cabinet.I am, Sir,Your obedient Servant, (Sgd.) J.R. BROOKE..' - 'cretary,ices of the Cabinet, . 2, Whitehall Gardens, S.IV.1. ' - -
